If / wouldn't / home, / they / walk / didn't / to / miss / had / the / have /       bus / they                                                                                                                         .      						   4.  to / travelled / Africa, / have / if / would / he / he / had / that / had / says /       the / father / opportunity / my                                                                                                                         .   5.  if / astronaut, / she / an / had / passed / become / the / have / exam /       would / she                                                                                                                            .
If I had learned to play the guitar, I would have been a rock star
They wouldn't have had to walk home, if they didn't miss the bus
If I had had more money, I would have stayed at the pub with my friends
My father says that he would have travelled to Africa, if he had had the opportunity
She would have become an astronaut, if she had passed the exam
